column3: ## Upload a file containing ISSNs the publisher does not own

Ensure that the ISSNs 0000-0002 and 0000-000X are in DOAJ attached to one or more journals (e.g. one with 0000-000X AND 0000-0002 or two, one with 0000-0002 and another with 0000-000X).  None of the journals with these ISSNs should be owned by the publisher
Go to the "Upload Article XML" tab in the "Publisher Area"
Choose "Crossref 4.4.2 XML" from "Format of the file" dropdown

Select "Choose file" and select the test resource file "unowned_issn.xml" from the Crossref 4.4.2 test resources folder

Test Resource: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DOAJ/doaj/feature/4147_make_font_and_layout_accessible/doajtest/xml_upload_test_package/Crossref/4.4.2/unowned_issn.xml

column4: A flash message appears at the top of the screen indicating a successful upload
Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "pending"

column3: wait a short amount of time for the job to process, then reload the page (do not re-submit the form data).  If the job remains in "pending", reload the page until the status changes.

column4: Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "processing failed" and a suitable entry in the "Notes".  Check that the explanation link goes to a suitable reason and resolution for the problem.

column3: click on "(show error details)" for the record in the "History of uploads"

column4: Additional error details are shown, indicating that the publisher does not own ISSNs "0000-0000" and "0000-000X"
